title: The Boy and the pelican
creator_credit: Geoffrey Gurnan, Arden Winch and Wessex Film Productions
brief_description: Pedro a pampered pelican lives happily on a Greek island until the arrival of a small boy called Hiko. Pedro is then forgotten by the islanders. He tries to fly away but is too bloated to succeed. On his return Pedro is seen by Niko who falls in love with him. Pedro is now completely happy.
